DefaultEvent.Description:
You offer an apology.

She listens, but indifferently. You are very nearly sure she is humming something faintly while you talk to her.
DefaultEvent.Name: That could have gone better

ChildBranches.Name: Apologise for the form of your meeting
ChildBranches.Description: Who knows - she may be responsible for paying the delivery charges.

DefaultEvent.Description:
You explain that you were paid only to deliver the boxes to these shores and no further.

She frowns at you, then shrugs.
DefaultEvent.Name: Arms and weight

ChildBranches.Name: Insist she bring help to carry the boxes
ChildBranches.Description: It's not your crew's proper job, after all.

Description:
One of the shadows moves. An Austere Acolyte steps into the light. She is covered head to foot in protective black, her fingers thickly gloved and goggles perched on the top of her head. It is plain she's unimpressed by what she's seen of you so far.

"Deliveries go up this path," she says, nodding towards the steepled building.
Name: Caught in the act
